import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-certs', standalone: true, template: `

Certifications

  • AZ-900 — Azure Fundamentals
  • Tricentis Tosca — AS1/AS2
  • Tricentis Tosca — AS1/AS2
  • Tricentis Tosca — AS1/AS2
  • Tricentis — TDS1/TDS2
  • Tricentis — AU1/AU2
` }) export class CertsComponent {}
